alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis; Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 5:33PM CDT until June 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR COVINGTON...WESTERN JONES AND NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 533 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lone Star, or near Collins, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Collins around 545 PM CDT. Seminary around 555 PM CDT. Sanford around 600 PM CDT. Hebron around 605 PM CDT. Moselle around 620 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
